exit-on-click-wrapper.description: When using the component wrapper, click the component wrapper to turn off the full-screen display. Defaults to true
exit-on-click-wrapper.description_zh: 组件式使用时，点击组件 wrapper 是否关闭全屏显示。默认为 true

fullscreen.description: When used as a component, you can control whether the component is displayed in full screen. Defaults to false
fullscreen.description_zh: 组件式使用时，控制组件是否全屏显示。默认为 false

fullscreen-class.description: The style class name of the custom component wrapper
fullscreen-class.description_zh: 自定义组件 wrapper 的样式类名

page-only.description: Display mode. true is the full screen of the web page, and false is the full screen of the browser. The default value is false
page-only.description_zh: 显示模式。true 为网页全屏，false 为浏览器全屏。默认值为 false

teleport.description: Whether to move the target element under the body. true is to move, false is not to move. The default value is false
teleport.description_zh: 是否将目标元素移动到 body 下。true 为移动，false 为不移动。默认值为 false

:z-index.description: When displayed in full screen, the zIndex of the target element
:z-index.description_zh: 在全屏显示时，目标元素的 zIndex

events.name: update:fullscreen
events.description: When used as a component, update the fullscreen property
events.description_zh: 组件式使用时，更新 fullscreen 属性

methods.name: toggle
methods.params: 函数式使用时，切换全屏模式

slots.name: default
slots.description: Custom content, which requires a slot to be listed in the layout
slots.description_zh: 自定义内容，需要在 layout 中列出 slot
